Uses of Package
data.representation.images.sift

  • Classes in data.representation.images.sift used by data.representation.images.sift 
    Class and Description
    LFeatRepresentation
    This class implements a container for individual local features that can be used as a feature representation of an individual image.
    LFeatVector
    A data holder class for the basic SIFT feature vector, where the first 4 values are Y, X , scale, orientation and the remaining ones belong to the descriptor.
  • Classes in data.representation.images.sift used by data.representation.images.sift.util
